_header: Pure wisdom in this world hath us reft

CULIi611.Transcription:
Pure wisdam this worlde hath vs Rafftepeace of lande ys loste and
                    lafteThe kingdan of Rome schalbe toreWithe sworde hunder and ffyer
                    therfore
CULIi611.Note:
Added to blank leaf at end of volume by a fifteenth-century
                    hand.
